PreferenceScreen.android:title: Game filter
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Select it to open game filter options

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show only favorites
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable it to show only favorites games in ROM manager

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Hide clones
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable it to hide clones in ROM manager

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Hide not working
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable it to hide not working games in ROM manager

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Reset filters to default
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Restore all filters to default values
Select it to open emulation options

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Auto switch resolution
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable it to auto swith game resolution to original minumun (Performance) regardless of emulation resolution (but ROM manager)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Audio sync
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable it to do audio sync (alternative sync for throttling disabled)
Enable it to turn speed throttling on. If you disable it autoframeskip is disabled also

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show FPS
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable it to turn FPS display on

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show info/warnings
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Shows Game Info and any warnings when a game is selected

com.seleuco.mame4droid.prefs.CheckBoxPre.android:summary: Enables the reading of the cheat database

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Save battery
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Try to save battery at the expense of jitter on some devices

com.seleuco.mame4droid.prefs.CheckBoxPre.android:title: Save hiscores
com.seleuco.mame4droid.prefs.CheckBoxPre.android:summary: If enabled, saves hiscores on some games not saving on NVRAM. It could cause problems with some games or save states

PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Select it to open vector games options

com.seleuco.mame4droid.prefs.CheckBoxPre.android:title: Beam 2x
com.seleuco.mame4droid.prefs.CheckBoxPre.android:summary: Sets the width of the vectors to 2x
Enables antialiased line rendering for vector games

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Default MAME data
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Restore MAME data to default values (cfg and nvram files)
Select it to open input options

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Touch controller
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Select it to open touch controller options

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Customize layout
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Select to customize fullscreen touch control layout

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Default layout
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Restore fullscreen touch control layout to default values

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Hide stick
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable to hide stick or dpad when fullscreen
Animated touch control. Disable for performance boost
Enable to vibrate when touch

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Digital dead zone
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable Touch Dead Zone

PreferenceScreen.android:title: External controller
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Select it to open external controller (GamePads) options

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Define keys
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Select to map emulator stick and buttons to physical keys or buttons

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Warn on exit
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable it to warn when you press the exit button in the external controller (or back) when gaming

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable right stick
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disable right stick when controller is autodetected

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Tilt controller
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Select it to open tilt controller options

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Tilt sensor
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable to use tilt sensor.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Tilt as analog
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable to use tilt sensor as analog device, disable to use as digital

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Touch anywhere
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable to tap anywhere on screen to fire. First finger is main fire. Second finger when first finger is pressed is alternate fire

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Invert X axe
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable to invert X axe.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Swap Z,Y axes
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable to swap Z,Y axes. This fixes vertical tilt on some devices

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Touch lightgun
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Select it to open touch lightgun options.\n(First finger will be main fire. Second finger when first finger is pressed will be alternate fire)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Bottom as reload
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Touch at the bottom of the screen to get off-screen reload

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Nvidia Shield
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Select it to open Nvidia Shield input options

com.seleuco.mame4droid.prefs.CheckBoxPre.android:title: Nvidia Shield mouse
com.seleuco.mame4droid.prefs.CheckBoxPre.android:summary: Enable Mouse support on Nvidia Shield devices. Also lets you use advanced arcade controllers features like X-Arcade Tankstick trackball on Nvidia Shield devices.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Shield Controller as a mouse
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable to use right stick on Shield Controller as a mouse instead as a second stick.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: P4,P3,P2 as P1
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Allow a single input device to control multiple players at once. Could cause problems in some ROMs

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Save-Load combo
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable it to press START+R1 to load a game and START+L1 to save a game

PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Select it to open general options

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Change ROMs path
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Change roms location. You have to move ROMs files manually

com.seleuco.mame4droid.prefs.CheckBoxPre.android:title: True RGB
com.seleuco.mame4droid.prefs.CheckBoxPre.android:summary: Render in true color at the expense of performance

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notification icon
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable it to show a notification icon when MAME4droid is suspended

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Scale beyond boundaries
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable it to scale beyond screen boundaries when a fixed scale is selected

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: TV overscan
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable it to apply a 10 pct safe area to correct overscan issues on some TV sets

PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Select it to open advanced options

com.seleuco.mame4droid.prefs.CheckBoxPre.android:title: Threaded video render
com.seleuco.mame4droid.prefs.CheckBoxPre.android:summary: Performance boost on double core devices. Disable it for hi-res emulated resolutions if you have artifacts or tearing at the expense of performance

com.seleuco.mame4droid.prefs.CheckBoxPre.android:title: Double buffer
com.seleuco.mame4droid.prefs.CheckBoxPre.android:summary: Avoids flickering at the expense of performance

com.seleuco.mame4droid.prefs.CheckBoxPre.android:title: Alternate OpenGL path
com.seleuco.mame4droid.prefs.CheckBoxPre.android:summary: Enable alternate OpenGL render path. Could be faster than default path but not work on some devices (like overlay rendering)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Debug mode
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Only for developers

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Touch controller visible
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disable to hide the touch controller. Useful when you are using a GamePad

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Smooth scaling
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Select to turn bitmap filtering on, at the expense of performance
Select to enable fullscreen portrait mode

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Touch controller visible
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disable to hide the touch controller. Useful when you are using a GamePad

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Smooth scaling
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Select to turn bitmap filtering on, at the expense of performance
